channel.title: Vincenzo goes to Datahood
channel.description: Recent content on Vincenzo goes to Datahood

item.title: First blog post ever
item.description: Hello out there, this is my first post. This is the start of a wonderful learning journey full of ups and downs, new insights and learnings. The name of this blog is based on the UK band “Frankie goes to Hollywood”. So, relax.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi there, I am Vincenzo and this is my journey into Data. From being a consultant for haute couture brands in Paris, analyzing data for the biggest european ecommerce platforms in Berlin, I already made some stops. Over the last years I learned how to think like a product manager and gained hands-on full stack web development skills, just to find my true passion now. I am a true lifelong learner and I want to immerse into data analytics and data engineering.
